  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3083</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3083</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">De la Terra a la Lluna</string>
            <string language="en">From the Earth to the Moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von der Masse zum Mond</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De la terre à la lune</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Da terra à lua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dalla terra alla luna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από τη γη στο φεγγάρι</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva que estudia la proporcionalitat inversa amb una miniaplicació que permet fer simulacions. Es treballa mitjançant diferents activitats amb taules, gràfics i expressions algèbriques o equacions  de les funcions. Conté activitats d'autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on inverse proportionality with a mini application for simulations, and activities using tables, graphs, and algebraic expressions or equations. It includes self-assessment exercises.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">matemàtiques aplicades</string>
            <string language="en">applied mathematics</string>
            <string language="es">matemáticas aplicadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gràfics per ordinador</string>
            <string language="en">computer graphics</string>
            <string language="es">gráficos por ordenador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">simulació</string>
            <string language="en">simulation</string>
            <string language="es">simulación</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf umgekehrter Proportionatität mit einer Minianwendung 
für Simulationen und Aktivitäten mit Tabellen, Diagramme und 
algebraische Ausdrücke oder Gleichungen. Sie schließt 
Selbstbewertung Übungen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur
la proportionnalité inverse avec une mini demande de simulations, et 
activités en utilisant des tableaux, des graphiques, et des 
expressions ou des équations algébriques. Elle inclut des 
exercices de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no 
proportionality inverso com uma aplicação mini para simulações, e 
atividades usando tabelas, gráficos, e expressões ou equações 
algébricas. Inclui exercícios do self-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) 
sulla proporzionalità inversa con una mini domanda di simulazioni ed 
attività usando le tabelle, grafici ed espressioni o equazioni 
algebriche. Include le esercitazioni di valutazione di se 
stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στην 
αντίστροφη αναλογικότητα με μια μίνι εφαρμογή για τις 
προσομοιώσεις, και δραστηριότητες που χρησιμοποιούν τους πίνακες, 
τις γραφικές παραστάσεις, και τις αλγεβρικές εκφράσεις ή τις 
εξισώσεις. Περιλαμβάνει τις ασκήσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">angewandte Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Computergraphiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mathématiques appliquées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">infographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">matemática aplicada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gráficos de computador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">matematica applicata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grafici di calcolatore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εφαρμοσμένα μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρονική γραφιστική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσομοίωση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
